text: Mátyás Szűrös (; born 11 September 1933) is a Hungarian politician. He was provisional President of the Republic from 23 October 1989 to 2 May 1990. His presidency occurred during Hungary's transition from Communism to democratic government.New Hungary Marks '56 Uprising: 'Gorby!' and 'Russians Out!' title: Mátyás Szűrös
